structure.title: Report Name
structure.description: Enter a name for the report

structure.title: Question Title (optional)
structure.description: Enter a name for the first question

structure.title: Question description
structure.description: Enter a brief description to explain the question

structure.title: Question format
structure.description: Select what type of response the answer should be

structure.title: Store
structure.description: Select the store the purchase was for.

structure.title: Expense Type
structure.description: What is the purpose of this purchase?

structure.title: Date of Purchase
structure.description: When was the purchase made? (Weekend skyco orders must be submitted on the following Monday)

structure.title: Payment Method
structure.description: How was the purchase paid for?

structure.title: Receipt Total
structure.description: List the payment total on the receipt, including taxes, shipping, etc.

structure.title: Sales Tax Total
structure.description: How much did we pay in sales tax on this order?

structure.title: Receipt / Invoice Upload
structure.description: Upload a copy of the receipt or invoice for this purchase.

structure.title: Group Name
structure.description: Enter the name of the group you want to create.
